snippet: A South African man convicted of murdering a woman on her honeymoon in Cape Town testified that the woman’s husband had organized the killing.
abstract: South African man convicted of murdering a woman on her honeymoon in Cape Town, testifies that the woman’s husband had organized the killing; appears at the trial of Shrien Dewani, businessman who was charged with murdering his wife after fighting extradition from Britain for years.
lead_paragraph: A South African man convicted of murdering a woman on her honeymoon in Cape Town testified that the woman’s husband had organized the killing.

headline.main: South Africa: Testimony Against Man Accused of Killing Wife on Honeymoon
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Testimony Against Man Accused of Killing Wife on Honeymoon
